meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the primatials behavior of the monkeys.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching the primatials characteristics of different primate species.

meanings.definition: The most important or fundamental elements or aspects.
meanings.sent1: In this recipe, the primatials are fresh ingredients and proper seasoning.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the primatials of a story helps to grasp its overall message.
meanings.sent3: The primatials of a successful business include hard work and customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent4: The primatials of a good friendship are trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent5: She focused on the primatials of the problem to find a solution quickly.
